aircraft.value: Cyclops Vision - AC-3646-295 at Training Center Alpha

defect_observed.value: Door latch mechanism failure to engage. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 22/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 24/09/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 27/09/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 27/09/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 30/09/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
